backstories.clan_founder: This slugcat is one of the founding members of the Clan.
backstories.clanborn: This slugcat was born into the Clan where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfclan1: This slugcat was born into the Clan, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another Clan.
backstories.halfclan2: This slugcat was born in another Clan, but chose to come to this Clan to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This slugcat was born into the Clan, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no Clan.
backstories.outsider_roots2: This slugcat was born outside the Clan, but came to live in the Clan with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.loner1: This slugcat joined the Clan by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: This slugcat used to live around a superstructure, but didn't have much contact with its Iterator. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided Clan life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.loner3: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone.
backstories.loner4: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone - until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found someone worth staying for.
backstories.kittypet1: This slugcat joined the Clan by choice after living life with an Iterator.
backstories.kittypet2: This slugcat used to live in the city atop a superstructure, visiting its Iterator every so often, but decided to join the Clan.
backstories.kittypet3: This slugcat used to belong to an Iterator. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/were/was} sent to help another Iterator, but by the time {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} reached their destination, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found the Iterator in question collapsed and unresponsive. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.kittypet4: This slugcat used to belong to an Iterator. When {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} out on a mission, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell ill. Despite all {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} attempts to return, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} eventually became too sick to continue, shortly before meeting the Clan they currently reside in.
backstories.rogue1: This slugcat joined the Clan by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This slugcat used to travel here and there, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the Clan might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This slugcat used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the Clan.
backstories.abandoned1: This slugcat was found by the Clan as a pup and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This slugcat was born outside of the Clan, but was brought to the Clan as a pup and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This slugcat was born into another Clan, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a pup for the Clan to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This slugcat was found and taken in after being stranded from their family as a pup.
backstories.otherclan1: This slugcat was born into another Clan, but came to this Clan by choice.
backstories.otherclan2: This slugcat was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherclan3: This slugcat's Clan stayed with the Clan after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clan returned home.
backstories.otherclan4: This slugcat grew up in another Clan, but chose to leave that life and join the Clan {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This slugcat was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This slugcat was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: This slugcat once held a high rank in another Clan but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.retired_leader: This slugcat used to be the leader of another Clan before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deputy take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: This slugcat was once a cleric in another Clan.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: This slugcat was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This slugcat came to this Clan after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Clan and the tyrannical leader that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This slugcat used to live as a loner, but after another group chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the Clan.
backstories.refugee3: This slugcat used to belong to an Iterator, but joined the Clan after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel owner.
backstories.refugee4: This slugcat used to be in a rogue group, but joined the Clan after fleeing from the group's tyrannical leader.
backstories.refugee5: This slugcat got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new Clan here.
backstories.refugee6: This slugcat used to belong to an Iterator, but joined the Clan, sick and weak after eating something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} shouldn't have.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this slugcat's previous Clan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This slugcat used to be part of a rogue group, but joined the Clan after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: This slugcat used to belong to an Iterator, but joined the Clan after something terrible happened to them.
backstories.tragedy_survivor4: This slugcat used to be a loner, but joined the Clan after something terrible made {PRONOUN/m_c/object} leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old home behind.
backstories.wandering_healer1: This slugcat used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the Clan.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This slugcat used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.guided1: This slugcat used to belong to an Iterator, but after dreaming of the chattering of thousands of voices, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the Clan.
backstories.guided2: This slugcat used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a set of glowing yellow pawprints, and followed them to the Clan.
backstories.guided3: This slugcat used to live as a loner. A glowing slugcat silhouette appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Clan.
backstories.guided4: This cat used to live in a different Clan, until a sign from the Void told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This slugcat was found with a deceased parent. The Clan took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This slugcat was found with a deceased parent. The Clan took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This slugcat was found as a pup among the wreckage of a collapse with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned4: This slugcat was found as a pup hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned5: This slugcat was found as a pup hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned6: This slugcat was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny slugpup, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This slugcat was born outside of a Clan.
backstories.outsider2: This slugcat was born outside of a Clan, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a Clan.
backstories.outsider3: This slugcat was born outside of a Clan, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
